message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I get $60, you get $40. We both win something.
Your turn Alice.  I'm feeling more generous than your previous offer. Let's make a deal!
Bob, let's be fair. This is a better offer than yours, and the clock is ticking.  I get $55, you get $45.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  Take this offer before inflation eats away at your share even more!
Bob, this is getting us nowhere. Let's split it evenly and call it a day. $50 each!
